content:
That's great to hear! I'm glad I could help. Remember to also reach out to the studios and galleries before visiting to confirm their hours, exhibitions, and availability of Rachel Lee's work. You might even want to ask if they have any upcoming exhibitions or events featuring her art.

Additionally, you could try searching for art studios and galleries that specialize in showcasing local or emerging artists, as they might be more likely to feature Rachel Lee's work or similar styles.

If you're unable to find studios or galleries featuring Rachel Lee's work, you could try contacting her directly through her website or social media. Many artists have online platforms where they showcase their work, share updates, and sometimes even offer private viewings or studio visits.

Lastly, don't be afraid to reach out to the local art community, ask questions, and seek recommendations. Artists, curators, and gallery owners are often passionate about sharing their knowledge and introducing people to new art and artists.

Have a fantastic time exploring the local art scene, and I hope you discover some amazing new art and artists, including more of Rachel Lee's work!
